title: (x) Choose Your Own Adventure book cover type - Revue {Norbert}
content:
Can anyone help identify the font used for the title ("The Cave of Time") for this Choose Your Own Adventure novel?:

[http://www.gamebooks.org/gallery/cyoa001n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110227130018/http:/www.gamebooks.org/gallery/cyoa001n.jpg "http://www.gamebooks.org/gallery/cyoa001n.jpg")

Thanks!
author: juice123

comments.content:
[Revue](http://web.archive.org/web/20110227130018/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/revue/revue/testdrive.html?s=THE+CAVE+OF&p=48).

-----------------------------------------  
Yes, I'm old, but I'm back in style!

Thank you!!

How appropriate for "The Cave of Time"
And the original <cite>Choose Your Own Adventure</cite> design used Benguiat for the title.
